de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.gui.data

Class OMCharts

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.gui.data.OMCharts

  • public abstract class OMCharts
extends java.lang.Object
    Public abstract class OMCharts providing helper methods and graphical tools for creating chart objects. Can not be instantiated.
    Author:
    A. Schoedon

    • Method Detail

      • createRoomChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createRoomChart(java.lang.String title,
                                         OMRoom room,
                                         boolean preview)
        Creates a chart displaying the radon concentration of a single room. Uses red for normal rooms, blue for cellar rooms and green for misc rooms.
        Parameters:
        title - The headline of the chart. Will be hidden if set to null.
        room - The room object containing the radon data.
        preview - Will hide annotations, labels and headlines if true.
        Returns:
        A chart displaying the radon concentration of a single room.

      • createCampaignChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createCampaignChart(OMCampaign campaign,
                                             boolean preview)
        Creates a chart displaying the radon concentration of a virtual campaign. Uses red for normal rooms and blue for cellar rooms.
        Parameters:
        campaign - The campaign object containing all rooms and radon data.
        preview - Will hide annotations, labels and headlines if true.
        Returns:
        A chart displaying the radon concentration of a virtual campaign.

      • createDistributionChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createDistributionChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                 org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.DescriptiveStatistics statistics,
                                                 OMRoomType roomType,
                                                 boolean preview)
        Creates a chart displaying the distribution of certain selected statistical values. Uses red for normal rooms and blue for cellar rooms.
        Parameters:
        title - The headline of the chart. Will be hidden if set to null.
        statistics - The selected statistics of a campaign containing all needed values.
        roomType - The room type to determine the color of the chart.
        preview - Will hide annotations, labels and headlines if true.
        Returns:
        A chart displaying the distribution of certain selected statistical values.
